H0.text: Day is the unit of time in which Earth orbits the Sun.

H1.text: Month is the unit of time in which Earth orbits the Sun.

H2.text: Year is the unit of time in which Earth orbits the Sun.

H3.text: Century is the unit of time in which Earth orbits the Sun.

A4.text: The sidereal year is the time taken for the Earth to complete one revolution of its orbit, as measured against a fixed frame of reference.

A5.text: A year is a unit of time based on how long it takes the Earth to orbit the Sun.
